videoData.title: Why is algebra so hard? The answer is surprisingly simple
videoData.socialTitle: Why is algebra so hard? The answer is surprisingly simple
videoData.description: Why is algebra so hard? Math teacher Emmanuel Schanzer believes the problem with math lies in what we tell students math is. Learn how Schanzer's innovative online math curriculum teaches students to solve problems through design in this upbeat talk.
videoData.socialDescription: Why is algebra so hard? Math teacher Emmanuel Schanzer believes the problem with math lies in what we tell students math is. Learn how Schanzer's innovative online math curriculum teaches students to solve problems through design in this upbeat talk.
